sear.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: to burn something with a sudden powerful heat
sear.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: to have a very strong sudden and unpleasant effect on you
sear.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: The image was seared into his brain.
sear.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: to cook the outside of a piece of meat quickly at a high temperature, in order to keep its juices in
